entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie this evening. Amount 2 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
